top.title: Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says
top.summary: US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday.

top.title: What latest Ukraine talks reveal about Putin's state of mind
top.summary: Russia's president looks determined to continue his war in Ukraine - even as the country's economic problems grow.

top.title: Israel says Rafah crossing to open soon to let Palestinians leave Gaza via Egypt
top.summary: Egypt denies it is co-ordinating with Israel to reopen the crossing, insisting that passage should be in both directions.

top.title: New homes delayed by 'energy-hungry' data centres
top.summary: The London Assembly found the growth of new data centres temporarily halted building some houses in 2022.

top.title: Production halted at Chinese factory making 'childlike' sex dolls
top.summary: The issue is in the spotlight after Shein announced a global ban on the sale of sex dolls with a childlike appearance.

top.title: India scraps order to pre-install state-run cyber safety app on smartphones
top.summary: The order to make the registration mandatory had led to a major backlash from several cyber experts.
